# shouldBufferInAnticipationOfPlayback

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the player starts buffering in preparation for a request to begin playback.

## Declaration

```swift
var shouldBufferInAnticipationOfPlayback: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

A [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] value indicates that a participant player requests starting playback at the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVDelegatingPlaybackCoordinatorPauseCommand/anticipatedPlaybackRate] value.

## Accessing command details

- **anticipatedPlaybackRate**: The rate at which the coordinator expects the current item to play.
